examples.example: 这一学期我的进步非常大，学到了很多有用的东西。

translate.english: This semester I have made great progress and learned a lot of useful things.

examples.example: 新的学期即将开始，我充满期待并准备好迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: The new semester is about to begin, and I am full of expectations and ready to meet new challenges.

examples.example: 这个学期我参加了很多社团活动，过得十分充实且快乐。

translate.english: This semester I participated in a lot of club activities and had a very fulfilling and happy time.
